data.title: Architectural Illustrations History and Description of Carlisle Cathedral. by Billings, Robert William.: Near Fine Hardcover (1840) 1st Edition, Inscribed No Value
data.meta_description: Inscribed No Value - 1st Edition - Hardcover - Thomas and William Boone., London. - 1840 - Condition: Near Fine - vi + 92 pp + 45 plates + ' Illustrations of Geometric Tracery from the Paneling Belonging to Carlisle Cathedral ' 1842. 8 pp + 19 plates. Inscription ( dated 1857 ) from ' a friend ' ( identified as Earl of Mount Edgcombe ) on ffep + two different names ( dated 1903 and 1918 ). Bookplate of different previous owner on paste down fep. Foxing to some plates ( mainly affecting margins ). Beautifully bound in near contemporary, red, full morocco with intricate gilt decoration, raised bands and gilt lettering. Near fine hardback. Aeg. - Architectural Illustrations History and Description of Carlisle Cathedral.
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

Prices of all books are quoted in pounds sterling. Payment may be made by credit card(VISA/MASTERCARD), cheque (UK only), or Bankers Draft in sterling(overseas)and PayPal. Cheques payable to Beardsell Books. Postage and insurance extra. Books will be sent by surface mail and insured by a Certificate of Posting.

Elaine & Christopher Beardsell run Beardsell Books as a partnership.

Address details: Elaine & Christopher Beardsell, Endfield, Field End Lane,

Holmbridge, Holmfirth, Huddersfield, West Y...

More Information

Shipping Terms:

Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.

We always ship using bubble wrap and padded bags. , unless the item is heavy or outsize

when a cardboard box is needed.
